mentors.name: Sarah Johnson
mentors.title: Senior Software Engineer
mentors.bio: Experienced software engineer passionate about helping others grow in their tech careers. Specialized in web development and modern JavaScript frameworks.

mentors.name: Michael Chen
mentors.title: Product Manager
mentors.bio: Product leader with experience in both startups and large tech companies. Passionate about building user-centric products and mentoring future product managers.

mentors.name: Emily Rodriguez
mentors.title: Data Scientist
mentors.bio: Data scientist with focus on machine learning and AI applications. Experienced in helping newcomers break into the field of data science.

mentors.name: James Wilson
mentors.title: UI/UX Designer
mentors.bio: Designer focused on creating intuitive and beautiful user experiences. Passionate about teaching design principles and mentoring aspiring designers.

mentors.name: Priya Patel
mentors.title: Marketing Director
mentors.bio: Marketing expert with experience in scaling startups and managing global campaigns. Specializes in digital marketing and brand development.

mentors.name: David Kim
mentors.title: Cloud Architect
mentors.bio: Cloud computing expert with extensive experience in architecting scalable solutions. Passionate about teaching cloud technologies and best practices.

mentors.name: Dr. Rachel Chen
mentors.title: Healthcare Innovation Director
mentors.bio: Leading healthcare innovation expert with experience in implementing digital health solutions and managing medical research projects. Passionate about mentoring healthcare professionals and technologists looking to make an impact in healthcare.

mentors.name: Marcus Thompson
mentors.title: Investment Banking VP
mentors.bio: Vice President at a leading investment bank with expertise in corporate finance and M&A. Dedicated to helping young professionals navigate the financial services industry and develop their careers.

mentors.name: Sofia Martinez
mentors.title: Creative Director
mentors.bio: Award-winning creative director with experience working with global brands. Passionate about nurturing creative talent and helping artists develop their professional portfolio and career strategy.

mentors.name: Dr. Alexander Wright
mentors.title: Education Technology Researcher
mentors.bio: Education technology researcher and former teacher with expertise in learning analytics and curriculum development. Committed to mentoring educators and EdTech entrepreneurs.

mentors.name: Rosa Perez
mentors.title: Sustainability Consultant
mentors.bio: Sustainability expert helping organizations implement green initiatives. Passionate about mentoring the next generation of environmental leaders and sustainable business practitioners.

mentors.name: Robert Goldwin
mentors.title: Biotech Research Director
mentors.bio: Biotech research director with experience in drug development and clinical trials. Dedicated to mentoring scientists and helping them bridge the gap between research and industry.

mentors.name: Lisa Anderson
mentors.title: HR Director
mentors.bio: HR leader specializing in talent development and DEI initiatives. Passionate about helping professionals navigate career transitions and develop leadership skills.

mentors.name: Ahmed Hassan
mentors.title: Cybersecurity Architect
mentors.bio: Cybersecurity expert with experience in designing secure systems for Fortune 500 companies. Committed to mentoring the next generation of security professionals.

mentors.name: Jessica Zhang
mentors.title: UX Research Lead
mentors.bio: UX research expert specializing in user behavior and product strategy. Passionate about mentoring designers and researchers in creating user-centered products.
